lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants have agreed on a three-year, $31 million deal with the free-agent outfielder Denard Span, pending a physical.
snippet: The San Francisco Giants have agreed on a three-year, $31 million deal with the free-agent outfielder Denard Span, pending a physical.

headline.main: Giants Reach a Deal With Span
headline.print_headline: Giants Reach a Deal With Span

abstract: San Francisco Giants sign outfielder Denard Span to three-year contract; other baseball news noted.
